title: Milestone 3: Gateway-Backed Agent Config + Workspace Files
description: Scope: Replace local config/FS access with gateway-backed operations; use config.get/config.patch for agent rename + heartbeat overrides; add a server-side tools.invoke proxy to read/write workspace files for a given agent session; update AgentInspectPanel to use new endpoints; remove project/cleanup/path-suggestion APIs; update or remove now-obsolete tests. Acceptance: renaming an agent writes to openclaw.json via gateway; heartbeat settings persist via config.patch; workspace files load/save against the gateway host; tests pass.

title: Milestone 1: Persist Gateway Settings + Layout
description: Scope: Add a studio settings store that persists gateway URL/token and per-gateway layout; add an API route to load/save it; update gateway connection hook + UI to read/write the persisted settings; include helpers to convert ws/wss URLs to http/https for tool proxying. Acceptance: gateway URL/token persist across reloads; layout can be saved for a gateway; unit tests cover settings normalization + URL conversion.
